metadata.title: CVE-2024-30259 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: FastDDS is a C++ implementation of the DDS (Data Distribution Service)standard of the OMG (Object Management Group). Prior to versions 2.14.1,2.13.5, 2.10.4, and 2.6.8, when a publisher serves malformed `RTPS` packet,heap buffer overflow occurs on the subscriber. This can remotely crash anyFast-DDS process, potentially leading to a DOS attack. Versions 2.14.1,2.13.5, 2.10.4, and 2.6.8 contain a patch for the issue.

criterions.comment: fastdds package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
